data.actual_result: Gif restarts from the beginning when the preview is opened
data.expected_result: Gif continues to play from the same position when preview is opened
data.short_description: Certain gifs restart when opening the preview
data.steps_to_repro: - Send a certain gif into chat (There will be some attached to the report to use - After sending the gif, click on it to open the preview - Observe the gif in chat as you open the preview
